verses.roman:
tāṅhāra prathama vāñchā kariye vyākhyāna
kṛṣṇa kahe,--'āmi ha-i rasera nidāna

synonyms: tāṅhāra—His; prathama—first; vāñchā—desire; kariye—I do; vyākhyāna—explanation; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; kahe—says; āmi—I; ha-i—am; rasera—of mellow; nidāna—primary cause.
translation: I shall explain His first desire. Kṛṣṇa says, "I am the primary cause of all rasas.
